record.id: field.name="delivery.objectives" and file.name="joinsvcDisplay" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: delivery.objectives
record.file.name: joinsvcDisplay

brief.brief: A list of objectives that describe the length of time that is expected for the delivery of the catalog item.
The name of the objective describes, in text format, the delivery time expected.

detail.detail: Each objective is restricted by the primary SLA of the user who is requesting the catalog item.
Multiple objectives can be restricted to the same SLA, in which case the user will be allowed to choose which objective to use for the catalog item being requested.
